title: Silver dust

properties.name: description
properties.value: Silver dust can be obtained by grinding a silver bar in the bone grinder in the Ectofuntus. Unlike most ground ingredients in Herblore, silver cannot be ground down by a pestle and mortar. It is an ingredient for the Guthix balance potion, used on several types of Vampyre. Silver dust has no other use besides the potion.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Silver dust
This article is about the ingredient used in making a Guthix balance. For the holiday event item, see Silver dust (2018 Birthday event).

Item ID7650

Silver dust can be obtained by grinding a silver bar in the bone grinder in the Ectofuntus. Unlike most ground ingredients in Herblore, silver cannot be ground down by a pestle and mortar. It is an ingredient for the Guthix balance potion, used on several types of Vampyre. Silver dust has no other use besides the potion.

[[File:Silver dust detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Silver dust''' can be obtained by grinding a [[silver bar]] in the bone grinder in the [[Ectofuntus]]. Unlike most ground ingredients in [[Herblore]], silver cannot be ground down by a [[pestle and mortar]]. It is an ingredient for the [[Guthix balance potion]], used on several types of [[Vampyre]]. Silver dust has no other use besides the potion.

}}
